title: Which apps can I remove to free up space without inhibiting the way my phone functions?
content: Which apps on my Pixel 3a Can I remove without inhibiting the way my phone functions? I would like to free up space in order to take more photos. For example, if I do not play games, do I need to have Google Play Games on my phone? Google Play Music? Google Play Movies and TV? Live Transcribe? Pixel Buds? Device Health Services? Device Personalization Services? Google Play Services for AR?  Live Transcribe? Playground?
